name: Die, Dice, Die!
description:
Die, Dice, Die!

A game made by Jordan Suter (@JOrbitsGames) and Ruben Nunez

Game

The goal of the game is to survive as long as possible. You have to fight against dice, but you also shoot dice. You can upgrade your dice powers after every level, by collecting the experience points dropped from enemies.

Controls

You can move the character with WASD and shooting is done with the left mouse button. The game supports controllers partially (No support for UI).

Thanks for playing!

Link to game jam page: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1620150

Music Credits

The games music was created by Kevin MacLead (incompetech.com)
